lines.text: You lived with him when he was nothing, you suffered his youth and the years of struggle, now you're entitled to half of everything he has.
I don't usually smoke cigars, it's just that my friend had a baby.
You can cry and not feel sad, just like you can feel sad and not cry.
I hate the art museum.
Will it hurt you to learn a thing or two?
All you learn from the art museum is how to keep your mouth shut and how to walk without making squeaky sounds with your shoes.
These tights itch!... These things stick to your butt!
And if she doesn't come out - We freeze our nuts off.
You don't have any nuts to freeze off, honey.
Want us to walk you inside?
No, I got it, but thanks for asking.
Give us a kiss.
Please, we're in public.
Good luck.
Are you all right? You seem a little... nice.
We wouldn't even be talking about this if you'd gotten some money out of that lady, we'd be on the road. You didn't because she was too pretty.
She was too smart.
And she was too pretty.
She was in a hurry.
And she was too pretty.
She was going to catch onto us.
And she was too pretty.
You're pretty, and I don't leave you alone.
She was too pretty.
Look, no swearing, no gambling, no spitting, no punching, and no kicking, all right?
Put a sock in it, I know what I'm doing.
The harder you hit me the more I'll know you love me.
Do you know how long you have to go to school to become a lawyer?
No.
20 years.
Slap my butt, no way!
Grey! Grey! Slow down! My legs are moving so fast my pantyhose are melting.
You want to know the rest of the story? I'm not her father. I met her mother one night in a bar. Some people get VD from a one-night stand, I got a baby.
